text: The 2019 Nordic Naturals Challenger was a professional tennis tournament played on hard courts. It was the 32nd edition of the tournament which was part of the 2019 ATP Challenger Tour. It took place in Aptos, United States between 5 and 11 August 2019. ==Singles main draw entrants== ===Seeds=== {|class="sortable wikitable" |- ! width="70"| Country ! width="175"| Player ! Rank1 ! Seed |- | |Damir Džumhur |92 |1 |- | |Steve Johnson |94 |2 |- | |Taro Daniel |118 |3 |- | |Dominik Köpfer |123 |4 |- | |Bjorn Fratangelo |124 |5 |- | |Egor Gerasimov |130 |6 |- | |Marcos Giron |138 |7 |- | |Michael Mmoh |159 |8 |- | |Enzo Couacaud |164 |9 |- | |Go Soeda |168 |10 |- | |Mitchell Krueger |174 |11 |- | |Emilio Gómez |177 |12 |- | |Christopher Eubanks |178 |13 |- | |Ramkumar Ramanathan |182 |14 |- | ~~~~| ~~Darian King~~ | ~~186~~ | ~~15~~ |- | |Ruben Bemelmans |188 |16 |} * 1 Rankings are as of July 29, 2019. ===Other entrants=== The following players received wildcards into the singles main draw: * Jenson Brooksby * Ryan Harrison * Brandon Holt * Sam Riffice * Donald Young The following players received entry into the singles main draw as alternates: * Dennis Novikov * Michael Redlicki * Alexander Sarkissian The following players received entry into the singles main draw using their ITF World Tennis Ranking: * Maxime Cressy * Lloyd Glasspool * Evan Hoyt * Martin Redlicki * Tim van Rijthoven The following players received entry from the qualifying draw: * Keegan Smith * Volodymyr Uzhylovskyi The following player received entry as a lucky loser: * Sem Verbeek ==Champions== ===Singles=== * Steve Johnson def. Dominik Köpfer 6–4, 7–6(7–4). ===Doubles=== * Marcelo Arévalo / Miguel Ángel Reyes-Varela def. Nathan Pasha / Max Schnur 5–7, 6–3, [10–8]. ==References== Nordic Naturals Challenger 2019 Nordic Naturals Challenger Nordic Naturals Challenger Category:August 2019 sports events in the United States
title: 2019 Nordic Naturals Challenger
